event: Made Ranji Trophy debut for Delhi
Led India to ICC U-19 World Cup victory
Named ICC ODI Player of the Year
Became full-time captain in all formats
Received Padma Shri, India's fourth-highest civilian award
Received Rajiv Gandhi Khel Ratna, India's highest sporting honour
Named ICC Male Cricketer of the Decade
Broke Sachin Tendulkar's record for most ODI centuries
